tools.description: List all available metric keys

tools.name: search_metric_keys
tools.description: Search metrics by text query

tools.description: List all active alerts

tools.description: Get details of a specific alert

tools.name: get_alert_history
tools.description: Retrieve alert history for a rule

tools.name: list_dashboards
tools.description: List all dashboards with summaries

tools.name: get_dashboard
tools.description: Retrieve full dashboard configuration

tools.description: List services within a given time range

tools.name: get_service_top_operations
tools.description: Get top operations for a service

tools.name: get_log_view
tools.description: Get full details of a log view

tools.description: Retrieve error and fatal logs

tools.name: search_logs_by_service
tools.description: Search logs for a specific service

tools.name: get_trace_field_values
tools.description: List available trace field values

tools.name: search_traces_by_service
tools.description: Search traces for a specific service

tools.name: get_trace_details

tools.name: get_trace_error_analysis

tools.name: get_trace_span_hierarchy
tools.description: Retrieve span hierarchy for a trace

tools.name: signoz_execute_builder_query
tools.description: Execute SigNoz Query Builder v5 query

tools.name: signoz_query_helper
tools.description: Helper for building SigNoz queries

tools.name: signoz_create_dashboard
tools.description: Creates a new monitoring dashboard based on the provided title, layout, and widget configuration. Use this tool when the user asks to build or create a new dashboard.

tools.name: signoz_update_dashboard
tools.description: Update an existing dashboard by supplying its UUID along with a fully assembled dashboard JSON object. The provided object must represent the complete post-update state, combining the current dashboard data and the intended modifications. Use this tool when the user asks to update an existing dashboard.
